javadoc: DomainObjectException provides a general RuntimeException when a catastrophic error occurs which may affect the integrity of a domain object such as an IOException.

name: DomainObjectException
comment:
DomainObjectException provides a general RuntimeException 
 when a catastrophic error occurs which may affect the integrity of a 
 domain object such as an IOException.
